eolFloat eol_input_is_input_down ( char *  input  ) 

determines the if the named input is in a down state at the point of this call.

Parameters:
input the name of the input in question. eg: "jump"
Returns:
the value of the input (if analog a float, if not 1 or 0)

Definition at line 426 of file eol_input.c.

eolFloat eol_input_is_input_held ( char *  input  ) 

determines the if the named input has been down continuously for set period of time. the held threshold is configureable.

Parameters:
input the name of the input in question. eg: "jump"
Returns:
the value of the input (if analog a float, if not 1) if it is held, 0 otherwise
